member.name: T:LeanFT.Selenium.By
member.summary: Contains all LeanFT for Selenium By methods for locating elements.

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.By.Name(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex)
member.summary: Returns a locator that locates elements by the specified name, described using a regular expression.
member.param: The name of the elements in the form of a regular expression.
member.returns: A locator that locates elements with the specified name.

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.By.Id(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex)
member.summary: Returns a locator that locates elements by the specified ID, described using a regular expression.
member.param: The ID of the elements in the form of a regular expression.
member.returns: A locator that locates elements with the specified ID.

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.By.ClassName(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex)
member.summary: Returns a locator that locates elements by the specified className, described using a regular expression.
member.param: The className of the elements in the form of a regular expression.
member.returns: A locator that locates elements with the specified className.

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.By.LinkText(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex)
member.summary: Returns a locator that locates elements by the specified linkText, described using a regular expression.
member.param: The linkText of the elements in the form of a regular expression.
member.returns: A locator that locates elements with the specified linkText.

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.By.TagName(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex)
member.summary: Returns a locator that locates elements by the specified tagName, described using a regular expression.
member.param: The tagName of the elements in the form of a regular expression.
member.returns: A locator that locates elements with the specified tagName.

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.By.Role(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a locator that locates elements by the specified role.
member.returns: A locator that locates elements with the specified role.

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.By.Role(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex)
member.summary: Returns a locator that locates elements by the specified role, described using a regular expression.
member.param: The role of the elements in the form of a regular expression.
member.returns: A locator that locates elements with the specified role.

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.By.Type(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a locator that locates elements by the provided type parameter.
member.returns: A locator that locates elements with the specified type.

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.By.Type(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex)
member.summary: Returns a locator that locates elements by the specified type, described using a regular expression.
member.param: The type of the elements in the form of a regular expression.
member.returns: A locator that locates elements with the specified type.

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.By.VisibleText(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a locator that locates elements by the provided visibleText parameter.
member.param: The visible text of the elements.
member.returns: A locator that locates elements whose visible text matches the specified text.

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.By.VisibleText(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex)
member.summary: Returns a locator that locates element by the specified visibleText, described using a regular expression.
member.param: The visible text of the elements in the form of a regular expression.
member.returns: A locator that locates elements whose visible text matches the specified text.

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.By.Visible(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a locator that locates elements that are either visible or not, depending on the parameter passed.
member.returns: A locator that locates elements that are either visible or not, depending on the parameter passed.

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.By.Attributes(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Returns a locator that locates elements according to one or more attributes. You can also use regular expressions.
member.returns: A locator that locates elements that have the specified attribute values.

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.By.Attribute(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a locator that locates elements according to a single attribute.
member.returns: A locator that locates elements that have the specified attribute value.

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.By.Attribute(System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex)
member.summary: Returns a locator that locates elements according to a single attribute, described using a regular expression.
member.returns: A locator that locates elements whose attribute value matches the specified pattern.

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.By.Styles(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Returns a locator that locates elements according to one or more styles. You can also use regular expressions.
member.returns: A locator that locates elements with the specified styles.

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.By.Style(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a locator that locates elements according to a single style.
member.returns: A locator that locates elements with the specified style.

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.By.Style(System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex)
member.summary: Returns a locator that locates elements according to a single style, described using a regular expression.
member.returns: A locator that locates elements whose style matches the specified pattern.

member.name: T:LeanFT.Selenium.ByAny
member.summary: A locator that locates elements that match one or more of the specified locators (attributes, tags, styles etc.).

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.ByAny.#ctor(OpenQA.Selenium.By[])
member.summary: A constructor for the ByAny locator.
member.param: The locators (Bys) by which the elements should be identified.

member.name: T:LeanFT.Selenium.ByEach
member.summary: A locator that locates elements that match all specified locators (attributes, tags, styles etc.).

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.ByEach.#ctor(OpenQA.Selenium.By[])
member.summary: A constructor for the ByEach locator.
member.param: The locators (Bys) by which the elements should be identified.

member.name: T:LeanFT.Selenium.Utils
member.summary: LeanFT for Selenium utilities.

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.Utils.GetSnapshot(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement)
member.summary: Returns a snapshot (image) of the selenium element.
member.param: The element to retrieve a snapshot for.

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.Utils.Highlight(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement)
member.summary: Highlights the selenium element in the browser.

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.Utils.Highlight(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,System.Int32)
member.summary: Highlights the selenium elements in the browser for time milliseconds.
member.param: The time (in milliseconds) that the element is highlighted. In case of a negative number, the method throws an ArgumentException. If time is less than 150, the element is not highlighted.

member.name: M:LeanFT.Selenium.Utils.ScrollIntoView(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement)
member.summary: Scrolls the page to make the web element visible.
member.param: The web element to scroll to.
